channel.title: Help plz
channel.description: just need help with some simple things since u guys are way better then me with coding i wanna change the colour and name of some npcs but i cant seem to i change the name of em on the hml file for npcdef.java but nothan happen cb lvl didnt change or colour and the name i have no idea what to do plz help me thanks btw this is just a test server and if i get it good enoufe i will try and lunch it thanks

item.title: Help plz
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Anything you change in NPCDef.xml will need changing in NPCs.rscd (client side) too.

item.title: Help plz

item.description:
@Shadowsoul wrote:

lol gl lunching ur server anyways, you need a RSCD file compresser and then you can compress the xml you edited and re-add the compressed verison. O shit and you have to edit the XML’s im pretty sure, not the .java’s

RSC Shadow
